english.segment1: Hail gladdening light, of Your pure glory poured. Who is the immortal Father, heavenly, blest. O Holiest of Holies, Jesus Christ our Lord
english.segment2: And now we've come to the sun's hour of rest. The lights of evening round us shine. We hymn the Father, Son, Spirit divine
english.segment3: Worthiest art thou at all times to be sung. O with undefiled tongue. Son of our God, giver of life, alone. Son of our God, giver of life, alone. Son of our God, giver of life, alone
english.segment4: Therefore in all the world. Thy glories, Lord, thine own
